set_name(String) - Method in class ClientListener
 
start() - Method in class ChatClient
Starts the ChatClient.serverListener thread to listen for commands coming from the Server, and then, it waits on standard input for user input.
start() - Method in class ChatServer
Listens on the server socket for client connections, and starts a separate ClientListener thread for each incoming connection.
stop() - Method in class ChatClient
Closes ChatClient.clientSocket, if it is still open, along with all its streams.
stop() - Method in class ChatServer
Closes ChatServer.serverSocket, if it is still open; then, it aborts all ChatServer.clients and waits for their threads to die.
